resources.string: This application\'s goal is to allow the user to map nearby Wi-Fi access points and to display these access points information. You will see on the map three color of markers : green indicates an access point that is not password protected, red indicates an access point that is password protected and yellow is a favorite access point that was pinned from the lists menu. The app uses a database updated by the users themselves, so it will get more accurate as the users move around scanning with the app.
